mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT(ID, SELLER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_AGE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE1, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE2, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE3) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sellerId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productAge}, #{productImage}, #{productCode}, #{productStock}, #{productType}, #{productCategoryName}, #{productDetail}, #{productSubImage1}, #{productSubImage2}, #{productSubImage3})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SELLER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_AGE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DATE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME, PRODUCT_EDIT_DATE, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE1, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE2, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE3 FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{id}
